data.title: The Trusts Arena, Auckland
data.meta_description: Trusts Stadium has got it all - sporting events, concerts, conventions, rock-climbing, you name it. Opened in 2004, Trusts has grown to become New Zealand's prime venue for all the above events & activities and much more. The stadium also houses the Momentum Health & Fitness Centre. Several sports teams, including the Trusts Diamonds call Trusts their home. Check out their hot website to see what many activities to indulge in and what or who's playing.
data.text: Monday to Friday 06:00 AM to 09:00 PMSaturday to Sunday 08:00 AM to 06:00 PM
